Uses of BalloonTip in net.java.balloontip
 

Subclasses of BalloonTip in net.java.balloontip
 class CustomBalloonTip
          Provides the same functionality as a BalloonTip, but you can add a certain offset, which can come in handy if attached to custom components.
 class TablecellBalloonTip
          Provides the same functionality as a BalloonTip, but can attach itself to a specific JTable's cell.
